title: Discoverable protected admin route and correct Internet Identity admin messaging

requirements.summary: Make /admin discoverable by always showing an Admin navigation entry while keeping the /admin page protected by the admin guard.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes an "Admin" entry that navigates to /admin.
If a non-admin user clicks "Admin", they are routed to /admin and shown an access denied screen (no admin content is rendered).
If an admin user clicks "Admin", they are routed to /admin and the admin product management UI is rendered.

file_operations.description: Remove the conditional rendering that hides the Admin link for non-admin users; always render the "Admin" navigation entry (desktop + mobile) routing to /admin, while optionally using the existing admin state (useIsAdmin) only for subtle UI hints (not for hiding). Use existing shadcn-ui primitives already imported (e.g., Button/Badge styling patterns) and existing routing helpers. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Confirm /admin remains routed through RequireAuth + RequireAdmin to ensure the admin guard still protects the AdminPage even though the navigation entry is visible to everyone; adjust only if needed to preserve the guard wiring (no new routes).

requirements.summary: Update /admin access denied messaging to reflect Internet Identity sign-in and that admin access is restricted to the Internet Identity linked to grandzbee@gmail.com.
acceptanceCriteria: The /admin access denied UI includes English text indicating that admin access is restricted to the Internet Identity linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com.
No UI claims that direct Google OAuth login is supported; wording references Internet Identity and linking to the specified Google account.

file_operations.description: Update the Access Denied CardDescription (and any other visible copy in this screen) to explicitly state: users must sign in with Internet Identity, and only the Internet Identity linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com is permitted as admin; avoid any wording implying Google OAuth login. Continue to rely on the existing authorization flow via useIsAdmin (actor.isCallerAdmin) for gating. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button components already used on this screen. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
